```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

## donnees ROE

```{r, eval = FALSE}
bbox_normandie <- 
  c(xmin = -1.944580,
    ymin = 48.133101,
    xmax = 1.966553,
    ymax = 50.145226) %>%
  sf::st_bbox(crs = 4326)

normandie_area <- 
  bbox_normandie %>%
  sf::st_as_sfc() %>%
  sf::st_sf()

# mapview::mapview(normandie_area)

roe_normandie <- 
  r4geobs::get_geobs_data_flux("REFERENTIEL_ROE_MONDE", normandie_area)
```


## donnees BDOE

```{r, eval = FALSE}
r4geobs::get_bdoe_data(login = "john.doe@ofb.gouv.fr",
```
